languages.text: Соломон Антар недолго оставался без дела: чувство справедливости не позволило ему наблюдать за растущим беззаконием сложа руки. Соломон и Глейто пропали на долгие годы, а после по Простору прошел слух о Незримом Судье, приходящим за головами самых жестоких преступников. От него нельзя было скрыться ни на пустотных станциях, ни в глубинах ульев. Десятки раз на Незримого Судью объявляли охоту, но ему всегда удавалось уйти невредимым. Говорили, что неизвестный мститель мог появиться в разных уголках сектора одновременно и даже менять обличье — были ли это преемники Незримого Судьи, подражатели или колдовской морок, история умалчивает.

Solomorne Anthar did not stay idle for long, as his sense of justice would not allow him to sit back and merely observe the growing lawlessness around him. He and Glaito disappeared for many years, after which a rumour began to spread throughout the Expanse of an Invisible Judge who came for the most ruthless of criminals and struck them down. There was no hiding from him on void stations or in the depths of hive worlds. Dozens of bounties were put on the Invisible Judge, only for him to escape every manhunt unscathed. It was said the faceless avenger was able to show up in different corners of the sector at the same time, and even to change his appearance. Whether these apparitions were the Invisible Judge's successors, his imitators, or sorcerous illusions remains unknown.
languages.original_text: Соломон Антар недолго оставался без дела: чувство справедливости не позволило ему наблюдать за растущим беззаконием сложа руки. Solomorne and Glaito went missing for many years, after which a rumour spread through the Expanse of an Invisible Judge who came for the cruellest of criminals and struck them down. There was no hiding from him in void stations or in the depths of hive worlds. Dozens of bounties were put on the Invisible Judge, only for him to escape every manhunt unscathed. The faceless avenger was said to be able to appear in different corners of the sector at the same time, and even to change his appearance. Whether those were the Invisible Judge's successors, his imitators, or sorcerous glamours remains unknown.

languages.text: Solomorne Anthar blieb nicht lange untätig, denn sein Gerechtigkeitssinn erlaubte es ihm nicht, sich zurückzulehnen und die wachsende Gesetzlosigkeit um ihm herum nur zu beobachten. Er und Glaito verschwanden für viele Jahre, und danach breitete sich ein Gerücht in der Ausdehnung aus, dass ein Unsichtbarer Richter zu den schlimmsten Verbrechern kommen und sie niederstrecken würde. Niemand konnte sich vor ihm verstecken, nicht auf Leerenstationen und nicht in den Tiefen von Makropolwelten. Dutzende Kopfgelder wurden auf den Unsichtbaren Richter ausgesetzt, doch er entkam jedes Mal. Es hieß, der gesichtslose Rächer könne gleichzeitig an verschiedenen Orten im Sektor erscheinen und sogar sein Aussehen verändern. Ob diese Personen Nachfolger des Unsichtbaren Richters waren, Nachahmer oder magische Illusionen, bleibt ungeklärt.
languages.original_text: Solomorne Anthar did not stay idle for long, as his sense of justice would not allow him to sit back and merely observe the growing lawlessness around him. He and Glaito disappeared for many years, after which a rumour began to spread throughout the Expanse of an Invisible Judge who came for the most ruthless of criminals and struck them down. languages.text: Solomorne Anthar ne resta pas longtemps les bras croisés, son sens aigu de la justice lui interdisant de se contenter d'observer l'anarchie croissante qui régnait autour de lui. Avec Glaito, ils disparurent pendant plusieurs années, après quoi une rumeur commença à se répandre dans toutes les Étendues ; un juge invisible terrasserait les pires criminels, qui n'auraient plus nulle part où se cacher. Sa tête fut mise à prix plus d'une dizaine de fois, et il fut l'objet de bien des chasses à l'homme, dont il ressortit systématiquement indemne. On racontait alors que ce justicier anonyme pouvait apparaître à plusieurs endroits du secteur en même temps et qu'il était même capable de changer d'apparence. Nul ne saurait dire en revanche si ces apparitions étaient les héritiers du juge, de simples imitateurs ou encore des illusions surnaturelles.
languages.original_text: Solomorne Anthar did not stay idle for long, as his sense of justice would not allow him to sit back and merely observe the growing lawlessness around him. Whether these apparitions were the Invisible Judge's successors, his imitators, or sorcerous illusions remains unknown.

languages.text: 索罗蒙·安萨没有闲暇太久，他的正义感不允许他无动于衷，眼睁睁地看着身边的罪恶行为不断滋长。他与格雷托失踪了很多年，在那之后，科罗努斯扩区中出现了这样的传闻：某个被称为“隐形仲裁者”的人会找到那些罪孽最为深重的犯人，将他们一一处决。无论是在虚空的星站之中，还是在巢都世界的深处，都逃不过这位仲裁者的审判。无数人对这位仲裁者发出了悬赏，但他每次都能毫发无损地躲避追捕。据说，这位神秘的审判者会同时出现在星区的多个区域，甚至还能改变自己的相貌。这些行踪诡秘的审判者是那位隐形仲裁者的继承人、模仿者吗？还是说，这是某种巫术力量召唤的幻象？答案不得而知。
languages.original_text: Solomorne Anthar did not stay idle for long, as his sense of justice would not allow him to sit back and merely observe the growing lawlessness around him. languages.text: Solomorne Anthar no descansó durante mucho tiempo: su sentido de la justicia no le permitía sentarse a observar el aumento de la criminalidad por el sector. Glaito y él desaparecieron durante muchos años, tras lo cual empezaron a oírse rumores por la Extensión sobre un Juez Invisible que daba caza a los criminales más despiadados. Era imposible ocultarse a sus ojos, por más que se internaran en estaciones del vacío o en las profundidades de los mundos colmena. Se ofrecieron numerosas recompensas por su cabeza, pero escapó indemne de toda cacería. Se decía que el vengador sin rostro era capaz de aparecer en distintos extremos del sector al mismo tiempo, e incluso cambiar su apariencia. Aún no se sabe si estos avistamientos son obra de los sucesores del Juez Invisible, de imitadores o de ilusiones creadas con hechicería.
languages.original_text: Solomorne Anthar did not stay idle for long, as his sense of justice would not allow him to sit back and merely observe the growing lawlessness around him. He and Glaito disappeared for many years, after which a rumour began to spread throughout the Expanse of an Invisible Judge who came for the most ruthless of criminals and struck them down. There was no hiding from him on void stations or in the depths of hive worlds. Dozens of bounties were put on the Invisible Judge, only for him to escape every manhunt unscathed. It was said the faceless avenger was able to show up in different corners of the sector at the same time, and even to change his appearance. Whether these apparitions were the Invisible Judge's successors, his imitators, or sorcerous illusions remains unknown.

Aún no se sabe si estos avistamientos son obra de los sucesores del Juez Invisible, de imitadores o de ilusiones creadas con hechicería.

languages.text: ソロモーン・アンサールはじっとしていることができなかった。彼の正義感は、周囲で増大する無法状態をただ傍観することを許さなかったのだ。彼とグライトは何年もの間姿を消し、その後、エクスパンス全域に「見えざる裁判官」が最も冷酷な犯罪者たちを狙い打ちし、彼らを打ち倒すという噂が広まった。彼から逃れることは、ヴォイドステーションの中でも、過密惑星の深部でも不可能だった。「見えざる裁判官」には数十件の懸賞金がかけられたが、彼はすべての人狩りを難なく逃れたという。彼は同時に星域の様々な場所に現れ、姿さえ変えることができると言われていた。これらの幻影が「見えざる裁判官」の後継者なのか、模倣者なのか、あるいは魔術的な幻影なのかは、今なお謎のままである。
languages.original_text: Solomorne Anthar did not stay idle for long, as his sense of justice would not allow him to sit back and merely observe the growing lawlessness around him. He and Glaito disappeared for many years, after which a rumour began to spread throughout the Expanse of an Invisible Judge who came for the most ruthless of criminals and struck them down. There was no hiding from him on void stations or in the depths of hive worlds. Dozens of bounties were put on the Invisible Judge, only for him to escape every manhunt unscathed. It was said the faceless avenger was able to show up in different corners of the sector at the same time, and even to change his appearance. Whether these apparitions were the Invisible Judge's successors, his imitators, or sorcerous illusions remains unknown.

languages.text: Solomorne Anthar, uzun süre hiç boş durmadı. Zira sahip olduğu adalet duygusu, çevresinde giderek büyüyen kanunsuzluğun karşısında eli kolu bağlı durmasına izin vermezdi. Solomorne ve Glaito yıllarca ortadan kayboldu. Bir vakit sonra Enginlik'in her yerinde en acımasız canilerin peşine düşen ve bu kâfirlerin hakkından gelen bir Görünmez Yargıç söylentisi yayılmaya başladı. Uçsuz istasyonlarında veya kovan dünyalarının derinliklerinde ondan kaçıp saklanacak delik yoktu. Görünmez Yargıç'ın kellesine onlarca ödül konuldu. Lakin o, her insan avından burnu bile kanamadan kurtulmayı başardı. Bu kimliği meçhul intikamcının aynı anda sektörün farklı köşelerinde ortaya çıkabildiği ve hatta suret değiştirebildiği söyleniyordu. Bu tezahürlerin; Görünmez Yargıç'ın halefleri mi, taklitçileri mi yoksa büyülü birer göz yanılsaması mı olduğu hâlâ bir muammadır.
languages.original_text: Solomorne Anthar did not stay idle for long, as his sense of justice would not allow him to sit back and merely observe the growing lawlessness around him. He and Glaito disappeared for many years, after which a rumour began to spread throughout the Expanse of an Invisible Judge who came for the most ruthless of criminals and struck them down. There was no hiding from him on void stations or in the depths of hive worlds. Dozens of bounties were put on the Invisible Judge, only for him to escape every manhunt unscathed. It was said the faceless avenger was able to show up in different corners of the sector at the same time, and even to change his appearance. Whether these apparitions were the Invisible Judge's successors, his imitators, or sorcerous illusions remains unknown.
